original_title: Getting It Right: The Making of Midway
overview: From shooting at Pearl Harbor on the very ground where American servicemen died on December 7, 1941 to recreating the USS Enterprise aircraft carrier on a massive sound stage, the filmmakers behind Midway had an unending commitment to tell the truth. Join director Roland Emmerich and his cast and crew on a film making journey fueled by their personal devotion to honoring the men and women who lived this story.
title: Getting It Right: The Making of Midway
